title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Noxious Weeds Order 2025 and comes
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Noxious Weeds Order 2025 and comes 

into operation on 14 May 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited noxious weed order 2025 come operation 14 may 2025

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. Blackgrass (Alopecurus myosuroides Huds.), Broad-Leaved Dock
text_raw:
2. Blackgrass (Alopecurus myosuroides Huds.), Broad-Leaved Dock 
(Rumex obtusifolius L.), Common Ragwort (Jacobaea vulgaris Gaertn.), 
Creeping Thistle (Cirsium arvense (L.) Scop.), Curled Dock (Rumex crispus L.), 
Spear Thistle (Cirsium vulgare (Savi) Ten.), Spring Wild Oat (Avena fatua L.) 
and Winter Wild Oat (Avena sterilis L.) are declared to be noxious weeds.
text_norm: 2 blackgrass (alopecurus myosuroides huds.) broad-leaved dock (rumex obtusifolius l.) common ragwort (jacobaea vulgaris gaertn.) creeping thistle (cirsium arvense (l.) scop.) curled dock (rumex crispus l.) spear thistle (cirsium vulgare (savi) ten.) spring wild oat (avena fatua l.) winter wild oat (avena sterilis l.) declared noxious weed

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. The area specified for this Order is the whole of the State.
text_raw: 3. The area specified for this Order is the whole of the State.

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 4. The following are revoked:
text_raw:
4. The following are revoked: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the Noxious Weeds (Thistle, Ragwort and Dock) Order 1937 (S.I. 
No.103 of 1937), 

the Noxious Weeds (Common Barberry) Order 1958. S.I. No. 120 
of 1958), 

the Noxious Weeds (Male Wild Hop Plant) Order 1965 (S.I. 
No.189 of 1965), and 

(d) 

the Noxious Weeds (Wild Oat) Order 1973 (S.I. No. 194 of 1973). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 May, 2025. 

MARTIN HEYDON, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [191] 3

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Order declares that the plants mentioned in Article 2 are noxious weeds. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [191]
